title: GraphModel
description: A graph model object provides data for graph views

name.description: The name of this graph model

displayName.description: The name of the graph model as it should be displayed in the user interface. For example, 'Workflow data'.

description.description: A description of the graph model. For example, 'Workflow data defines necessary data elements to show workflow graphically.'.

category.description: The category of the graph model. For example, 'UserModels'.
